description: A finding indicating the presence or absence of an aortic valve replacement, along with its characteristics.

attributes.name: Presence of Aortic Valve Replacement
attributes.description: Indication of whether an aortic valve replacement is present or absent.

values.name: Present
values.description: The finding indicates the presence of an aortic valve replacement.

values.name: Absent
values.description: The finding indicates the absence of an aortic valve replacement.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: The status of the aortic valve replacement.

values.name: New placement
values.description: The aortic valve replacement has been newly placed.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The aortic valve replacement has not changed since the previous examination.

values.name: Complication
values.description: The aortic valve replacement is associated with a complication.

values.name: Removed
values.description: The aortic valve replacement has been removed.

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: The type of aortic valve replacement.

values.name: Mechanical
values.description: The aortic valve replacement is mechanical.

values.name: Biological
values.description: The aortic valve replacement is biological.

values.name: TAVR
values.description: The aortic valve replacement utilizes a transcatheter aortic valve replacement method.

attributes.name: Position
attributes.description: The position of the aortic valve replacement.

values.name: Proper
values.description: The aortic valve replacement is properly positioned.

values.name: Malpositioned
values.description: The aortic valve replacement is malpositioned.

attributes.name: Paravalvular Leak
attributes.description: Indication of whether a paravalvular leak is present or absent.

attributes.name: Valve Thrombosis
attributes.description: Indication of whether valve thrombosis is present or absent.
